/*
resolver
*/'use strict';
 
var pathogen = require('pathogen');
var prime = require('prime');
var flow = require('finally');
 
var isString = require('mout/lang/isString');
var isPlainObject = require('mout/lang/isPlainObject');
var contains = require('mout/array/contains');
 
// node_modules folder.
// In the future this might be configurable.
var node_modules = 'node_modules';
 
// absolute path
var absRe = /^(\/|.+:\/)/;
// relative path
var relRe = /^(\.\/|\.\.\/)/;
 
// implementation of http://nodejs.org/api/modules.html#modules_all_together
 
var natives = [
  '_debugger', '_linklist', 'assert', 'buffer', 'child_process', 'console', 'constants', 'crypto',
  'cluster', 'dgram', 'dns', 'domain', 'events', 'freelist', 'fs', 'http', 'https', 'module',
  'net', 'os', 'path', 'punycode', 'querystring', 'readline', 'repl', 'stream', '_stream_readable',
  '_stream_writable', '_stream_duplex', '_stream_transform', '_stream_passthrough',
  'string_decoder', 'sys', 'timers', 'tls', 'tty', 'url', 'util', 'vm', 'zlib'
];
 
var isNative = function(pkg) {
  return contains(natives, pkg);
};
 
var Resolver = prime({
 
  // function to get file contents. environment dependant.
  constructor: function(transport, isNode) {
    this.transport = transport;
    this.isNode = !!isNode;
  },
 
  // resolve required from a specific location
  // follows the browser field in package.json
  resolve: function(from, required, callback) {
    if (isNative(required)) {
      if (this.isNode) callback(null, required);
      else this._findRoute(this._paths(from), required, callback);
    } else {
      if (this.isNode) this._resolve(from, required, callback);
      else this._resolveAndRoute(from, required, callback);
    }
    return this;
  },
 
  _resolveAndRoute: function(from, required, callback) {
    var self = this;
 
    this._resolve(from, required, function(error, resolved) {
      if (error) callback(error, required);
      else self._route(from, resolved, callback);
    });
  },
 
  // resolve required from a specific location
  // does not follow the browser field in package.json
  _resolve: function(from, required, callback) {
    if (relRe.test(required)) this._load(pathogen(from + '/' + required), callback);
    else if (absRe.test(required)) this._load(required, callback);
    else this._package(from, required, callback);
  },
 
  _findRoute: function(dirs, resolved, callback) {
    var self = this;
    var findRoute = flow();
    findRoute.sequential(dirs, function(dir) {
      var findRouteControl = this;
 
      self.transport(pathogen(dir + '/package.json'), function(error, data) {
        if (error) return findRouteControl.continue(null, resolved);
 
        var findRule = flow();
        var json = JSON.parse(data);
 
        if (isPlainObject(json.browser)) findRule.sequential(json.browser, function(value, key) {
          var findRuleControl = this;
 
          if (isNative(key)) {
 
            if (key === resolved) {
              Iif (!value) findRouteControl.break(null, false);
              else self._resolveAndRoute(dir, value, findRouteControl.break);
            } else {
              findRuleControl.continue();
            }
 
          } else {
 
            self._resolve(dir, key, function(error, res) {
              Iif (error) return findRuleControl.continue();
              if (res === resolved) {
                if (!value) findRouteControl.break(null, false);
                else self.resolve(dir, value, findRouteControl.break);
              } else {
                findRuleControl.continue();
              }
            });
 
          }
        });
        findRule.finally(function() {
          findRouteControl.continue(null, resolved);
        });
      });
    });
 
    findRoute.finally(callback);
  },
 
  // finds the routed entry in the browser field in package.json
  // when not found it will simply callback resolved
  _route: function(from, resolved, callback) {
    var self = this;
    var dirs = this._paths(from);
    this.findRoot(resolved, function(error, dir) {
      Iif (error) return callback(error);
      if (dirs[0] !== dir) dirs.unshift(dir);
      self._findRoute(dirs, resolved, callback);
    });
  },
 
  // resolves either a file or a directory to a module, based on pattern
  _load: function(required, callback) {
    var self = this;
    var findModule = flow();
    if (!(/\/$/).test(required)) findModule.then(function() {
      var control = this;
      self._file(required, function(error, resolved) {
        if (error) control.continue(error);
        else control.break(null, resolved);
      });
    });
    findModule.then(function() {
      var control = this;
      self._directory(required, function(error, resolved) {
        if (error) control.continue(error);
        else control.break(null, resolved);
      });
    });
    findModule.finally(callback);
  },
 
  // resolves a file name to a module
  _file: function(required, callback) {
    var transport = this.transport;
    var findFile = flow();
    var exts = ['.js'];
    if (pathogen.extname(required)) exts.unshift('');
    // try all the extensions to find a suitable file
    findFile.sequential(exts, function(ext) {
      var control = this;
      var name = required + ext;
      transport(name, function(error) {
        if (error) control.continue(error);
        else control.break(null, name);
      });
    });
    findFile.finally(callback);
  },
 
  // resolves a directory to a module
  // takes into account the main field (or browser field as string)
  _directory: function(required, callback) {
    var self = this;
    this.transport(pathogen(required + '/package.json'), function(error, data) {
      var json = data ? JSON.parse(data) : {};
      var main = isString(json.browser) ? json.browser : (json.main || 'index');
      self._file(pathogen(required + '/' + main), callback);
    });
  },
 
  // resolves a packaged require to a module
  _package: function(from, required, callback) {
    var self = this;
 
    var packageName = required.split('/')[0];
    // make it into an explicit folder if it's only a package
    if (required.indexOf('/') === -1) required += '/';
 
    this.resolvePackage(from, packageName, function(error, path) {
      if (error) callback(error);
      else self._load(path + required, callback);
    });
  },
 
  // generates a list of possible node modules paths
  _paths: function(path) {
    var m = path.match(absRe);
    var bit = m ? m[0] : '';
    var parts = pathogen(path + '/').split('/');
    var dirs = [];
    for (var i = parts.length - 2; i > 0; i--) {
      if (parts[i] === node_modules) continue;
      var dir = pathogen(bit + parts.slice(1, i + 1).join('/') + '/');
      dirs.push(dir);
    }
    dirs.push(pathogen(bit + '/'));
    return dirs;
  },
 
  resolvePackage: function(from, packageName, callback) {
    var self = this;
    var findPackage = flow();
    var dirs = this._paths(from);
    findPackage.sequential(dirs, function(dir) {
      var control = this;
      self.transport(pathogen(dir + '/' + node_modules + '/' + packageName + '/package.json'), function(error, json) {
        if (error) control.continue(error);
        else control.break(null, pathogen(dir + '/' + node_modules + '/'), JSON.parse(json));
      });
    });
    findPackage.finally(callback);
  },
 
  // find the package root of a specified file or dir
  findRoot: function(path, callback) {
    path = pathogen.dirname(path);
    var transport = this.transport;
    var dirs = this._paths(path);
    var findRoot = flow();
    findRoot.sequential(dirs, function(dir) {
      var control = this;
      transport(pathogen(dir + '/package.json'), function(error, json) {
        if (error) control.continue(error);
        else control.break(null, dir, JSON.parse(json));
      });
    });
    findRoot.finally(callback);
    return this;
  }
 
});
 
Resolver.natives = natives;
Resolver.isNative = isNative;
 
module.exports = Resolver;
 
Generated by istanbul at Wed May 21 2014 01:25:17 GMT+0200 (CEST)
